Sample.Name: Invoice
Sample.Title: Invoice
Sample.Description: This demo shows how to create simple invoice report using PDF grid with built-in styles.

Sample.Name: Certificate
Sample.Title: Course Completion Certificate
Sample.Description: This demo shows how to dynamically generates the course completion certificate for online learning portal with participant name, course name and date of completion.

Sample.Name: ImageInsertion
Sample.Title: Image Insertion
Sample.Description: This demo shows how to insert images in a PDF document.

Sample.Name: Encryption
Sample.Title: Encryption
Sample.Description: This demo shows how to encrypt the existing PDF document to protect documents against unauthorized access.

Sample.Name: DigitalSignature
Sample.Title: Digital Signature
Sample.Description: This demo shows how to digitally sign the PDF document with .pfx certificates.

Sample.Name: CompressExistingPDF
Sample.Title: Compression
Sample.Description: This demo shows how to compress an existing PDF document based on image quality, page content, metadata, and font to reduce the file size of the PDF document.

Sample.Name: PDFToPDFAConformance
Sample.Title: Conformance
Sample.Description: This demo shows how to convert existing PDF document to PDFA standard document.

Sample.Name: RemoveImage
Sample.Title: Remove Image
Sample.Description: This demo shows how to remove images from an existing PDF document.
